gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka

Class KafkaSource<S,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<S,D>

    Source<S,D>

    KafkaSimpleSource

    public abstract class KafkaSource<S,D>
extends EventBasedSource<S,D>
    A Source implementation for Kafka source.

    • Method Detail

      • getWorkunits

        public List<WorkUnit> getWorkunits(SourceState state)

      • isTopicQualified

        protected boolean isTopicQualified(KafkaTopic topic)
        Whether a KafkaTopic is qualified to be pulled. This method can be overridden by subclasses for verifying topic eligibility, e.g., one may want to skip a topic if its schema cannot be found in the schema registry.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown(SourceState state)
        Specified by:
